track.name: When I Fall in Love
comments: SOOOOOOOOOOOO  Goood!!!  MY  Favorite Nat King Cole Song!!!!!
why cant we have good music like this today. please musicians listen to this and see where you are going wrong with today's music
Now this is what a real musicians souds like. Can't get enough of Nat.
For music such as this, I believe I was born in the wrong era. I love these sounds and cant desire to love the music of today as I love so many songs from this time period.
I remember listening to Nat in the 1940s. Great.
Cuando me enamoro............  as is said, in the language of love, Espana........
lalalala hmmm mmmm feels like in a fairytale<3

Under the moonlight, in a green and silent spot, amid the hills. A warm summer's evening, of course, some wine and some food, with a little romantic music and a lovely lady in one's arms. Bliss.............  Or even on a summer's day, under the sun......
